summary: An email from Laura Isabel Woods to an unspecified attorney, referencing Jeffrey Epstein as a registered sex offender in Beaufort, NC, and requesting compensation from Marriott for an incident at a Marriott property in China. The email includes an attachment of an alias for Epstein.

persons.name: Laura Isabel Woods
persons.role: Teacher at Hangzhou (China) International School, email sender
persons.context: Author of the email, identifies herself as a teacher at Hangzhou International School, and is requesting compensation from Marriott for an incident at a Marriott property in China.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as a registered sex offender in Beaufort, NC; an alias for him is attached to the email.

persons.name: Jeffrey L. Klomser
persons.context: Referenced indirectly via the attached image file 'Jeffrey_L_Klomser_(NC).jpg', which is described as an alias for Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Woods references Epstein in her email to an attorney, attaching an alias for him, though the exact nature of their connection is not specified.

events.title: Incident at Marriott property in China
events.description: An unspecified incident occurred at a Marriott property in China, for which Laura Woods is seeking compensation from the hotel chain.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a registered sex offender in Beaufort, North Carolina.
An alias for Jeffrey Epstein is referenced in an attached image file named 'Jeffrey_L_Klomser_(NC).jpg'.
Laura Isabel Woods, a teacher at Hangzhou International School, is seeking compensation from Marriott for an incident at one of their properties in China.
The email is dated September 12, 2019, after Epstein's death in August 2019.
